title: Project-Based Learning for Strengthening Collaborative Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Document Writing Experience
context.additional_context: Course for in-service professionals to address workplace collaborative writing requirements, conducted in a BYOD environment with summative assessment-centered operations

learning_goals: Learners will be able to draft reports reflecting organizational objectives through project-based collaboration.
Learners will be able to improve document drafts by over 80% by reflecting peer feedback.
Learners will be able to perform real-time document editing and sharing processes with team members using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
